markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 26"
    pfs=""
>
[Ancestral Embrace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1528)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 76

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brightly colored _+4 [major resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_ is inscribed with a spiral that has no end or beginning. Though it is a symbol of the ancient religion of Holy Xatramba, it also serves as a [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14). When you invest the armor, you gain negative resistance 25 and can draw on the power of your ancestors. You gain an ancestry feat from your ancestry; the feat can be any level, but you must meet any other prerequisites of the feat. You lose the feat when the investment ends, and you can select a different feat each time you invest the armor again.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You use an ancestry feat that has a limited number of uses per day;  **Effect** You gain an additional use of the ancestry feat. If you do not use it before the next time you make your daily preparations, the use is lost.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;   **Trigger** You begin casting a [_legend lore_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=15) ritual to learn legends about your ancestry or about someone of your ancestry;  **Effect** _Ancestral Embrace_ reduces the casting time of this ritual to 1 hour, and you don't need secondary casters for this ritual.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The armor casts [_avatar_](/Spells.aspx?ID=16), granting these specific additional abilities instead of those associated with a deity: Speed 70 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain; **Melee** <actions string="Single Action" /> spear ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [thrown 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 6d6+6 piercing; **Ranged** <actions string="Single Action" /> blowgun ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d6+3 piercing plus 5d6 poison.

**Destruction** _Ancestral Embrace_ crumbles if its wearer intentionally and knowingly kills or desecrates the remains of six generations of their family.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ancestral Embrace
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 76
